Comment [Strain]: A mouse line with cre-dependent tdTomato expression was crossed with a mouse line allowing tamoxifen-inducible Cre recombinase expression under the control of the mouse Tph2 promoter. The resulting mouse line expresses tdTomato in TPH2 ( serotonergic) neurons.
Comment [Image Description]: A stack of a TPH2-tdTomato mouse brain (Passive CLARITY) taken using the mesoSPIM (zoom 0.63x). Excitation was 561 nm, detection using a 561LP (AHF  561LP Edgebasic). The resulting dataset was rotated by 6 degrees to compensate sample tilt.

Comment [Strain]: A mouse line with cre-dependent tdTomato expression was crossed with a mouse line allowing tamoxifen-inducible Cre recombinase expression under the control of the mouse Tph2 promoter. The resulting mouse line expresses tdTomato in TPH2 ( serotonergic) neurons.
Comment [Image Description]: Maximum intensity projection of slices 800 to 850 (250 micron range) of the ExpC_TPH2_whole_brain dataset
